extension.summary: Stalker VOD Client with TMDB metadata
extension.description: Kodi Stalker client for accessing on demand videos and channels from Stalker middleware. Extended with TMDB metadata (posters, fanart, ratings).
extension.news: v0.0.1 (2026-02-18) - Fork of plugin.video.stalkervod v1.2.0 by rickeylohia (GPL-3.0) - Added TMDB metadata integration: posters, fanart, plot and ratings for VOD and Series listings via The Movie Database API. - New settings tab: TMDB API key, language and enable/disable toggle. - Results cached locally (30-day expiry) to minimise API calls. - Sets tmdb unique ID on ListItems for TMDb Helper addon compatibility.
